casebody.data:
Seggerman v. Valentine. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. October 24, 1892.) Action by Frederick Seggerman against Napoleon Valentine.

Argued before McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Chas. Curie, for plaintiff. John H. Parsons, for defendant.

No opinion. Motion denied, without costs. See 19 N. Y. Supp. 711.
